title: PNW Range Handlebar Gen 3 gets bigger AND lighter, now available in 35.0 or 31.8
content:
Is bigger really better? Obviously, that depends on the subject, but when it comes to 35.0mm handlebars PNW has been patiently waiting. Not for the industry to come to a consensus, but the company claims to have held off on making a larger diameter bar until it was something they wanted to ride themselves. That meant […]

The post PNW Range Handlebar Gen 3 gets bigger AND lighter, now available in 35.0 or 31.8 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
